name: D HEROES BEST DECK
author: SyarienM
notes: Ok decided that decider is not relevant to the meta and used drilldark for more board control and its excellent. Easiest kog i had ever had and the most fun. Just only got 3 anki yesterday. Tth can be used with destroying one of your monster and another opponent monster eg; kushmushroom and thats why more board control is important. Might be the best build so far for D. Heroes.
